# Treasury â€“ Cash Management Rules

## Management Rules
- Cash movements must be explicitly authorized.
- All cash transfers must be traceable and auditable.
- Cash pooling arrangements must be explicitly defined.

## Control Requirements
- Cash balances must reconcile with external statements.
- Manual intervention must be logged and justified.

## Forbidden
- Unapproved cash movements
- Backdated cash adjustments
- Hidden offsetting entries
